--all=false.Description: if true, select all services in the namespace

-A.Description: if true, select services across all namespaces

--all-namespaces=false.Description: if true, select services across all namespaces

--dry-run=false.Description: If true, only print the annotations that would be written, without annotating or idling the relevant objects

--resource-names-file=''.Description: file containing list of services whose scalable resources to idle

-l.Description: Selector (label query) to use to select services

--selector=''.Description: Selector (label query) to use to select services
